name: Imprison

Enchant creature

Whenever enchanted creature attacks or blocks, you may pay {1}. If you do, tap the creature, remove it from combat, and creatures it was blocking that had become blocked by only that creature this combat become unblocked. If you don't, destroy this Aura.

name: Primordial Ooze
rulesTexts:
This creature attacks each combat if able.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Then you may pay {X}, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on it. If you don't, tap this creature and it deals X damage to you.

name: Shield Wall
rulesTexts: Creatures you control get +0/+2 until end of turn.

name: Kry Shield
rulesTexts: {2}, {T}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by target creature you control. That creature gets +0/+X until end of turn, where X is its mana value.

name: Glyph of Reincarnation
rulesTexts:
Cast this spell only after combat.
Destroy all creatures that were blocked by target Wall this turn. They can't be regenerated. For each creature that died this way, put a creature card from the graveyard of the player who controlled that creature the last time it became blocked by that Wall onto the battlefield under its owner's control.

name: Abomination
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked by a green or white creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.

name: Cocoon
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature you control
When this Aura enters, tap enchanted creature and put three pupa counters on this Aura.
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during your untap step if this Aura has a pupa counter on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a pupa counter from this Aura. If you can't, sacrifice it, put a +1/+1 counter on enchanted creature, and that creature gains flying.

name: Giant Strength
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2.

name: Divine Transformation
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.

name: Mirror Universe
rulesTexts: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Exchange life totals with target opponent. Activate only during your upkeep.

name: Relic Bind
rulesTexts:
Enchant artifact an opponent controls
Whenever enchanted artifact becomes tapped, choose one —
• This Aura deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Target player gains 1 life.

name: Wall of Dust
rulesTexts:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Whenever this creature blocks a creature, that creature can't attack during its controller's next turn.

name: Axelrod Gunnarson
rulesTexts:
Trample
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Axelrod Gunnarson this turn dies, you gain 1 life and Axelrod Gunnarson deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

name: Elven Riders
rulesTexts: This creature can't be blocked except by Walls and/or creatures with flying.

name: Active Volcano
rulesTexts:
Choose one —
• Destroy target blue permanent.
• Return target Island to its owner's hand.

name: Rust
rulesTexts: Counter target activated ability from an artifact source. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)

name: Palladia-Mors
rulesTexts:
Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Palladia-Mors unless you pay {R}{G}{W}.

name: Radjan Spirit
rulesTexts: {T}: Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

name: Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
rulesTexts:
Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.
This creature can't be blocked except by Walls.

name: D'Avenant Archer
rulesTexts: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Psychic Purge
rulesTexts:
Psychic Purge deals 1 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard this card, that player loses 5 life.

name: Sword of the Ages
rulesTexts:
This artifact enters tapped.
{T}, Sacrifice this artifact and any number of creatures you control: This artifact deals X damage to any target, where X is the total power of the creatures sacrificed this way, then exile this artifact and those creature cards.

name: Chain Lightning
rulesTexts: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Puppet Master
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to its owner's hand. If that card is returned to its owner's hand this way, you may pay {U}{U}{U}. If you do, return this card to its owner's hand.

name: Boomerang
rulesTexts: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Johan
rulesTexts: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have Johan gain "Johan can't attack" until end of combat. If you do, attacking doesn't cause creatures you control to tap this combat if Johan is untapped.

name: Livonya Silone
rulesTexts: First strike; legendary landwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a legendary land.)

name: Pixie Queen
rulesTexts:
Flying
{G}{G}{G}, {T}: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Horror of Horrors
rulesTexts: Sacrifice a Swamp: Regenerate target black creature. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, instead tap it, remove it from combat, and heal all damage on it.)

name: Glyph of Life
rulesTexts: Choose target Wall creature. Whenever that creature is dealt damage by an attacking creature this turn, you gain that much life.

name: Wolverine Pack
rulesTexts: Rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

name: Acid Rain
rulesTexts: Destroy all Forests.

name: Lesser Werewolf
rulesTexts: {B}: If this creature's power is 1 or more, it gets -1/-0 until end of turn and put a -0/-1 counter on target creature blocking or blocked by this creature. Activate only during the declare blockers step.

name: Nova Pentacle
rulesTexts: {3}, {T}: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, that damage is dealt to target creature of an opponent's choice instead.

name: Wall of Wonder
rulesTexts:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{2}{U}{U}: This creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn and can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

name: Remove Enchantments
rulesTexts: Return to your hand all enchantments you both own and control, all Auras you own attached to permanents you control, and all Auras you own attached to attacking creatures your opponents control. Then destroy all other enchantments you control, all other Auras attached to permanents you control, and all other Auras attached to attacking creatures your opponents control.

name: Enchantment Alteration
rulesTexts: Attach target Aura attached to a creature or land to another permanent of that type.

name: Relic Barrier
rulesTexts: {T}: Tap target artifact.

name: Wall of Earth
rulesTexts: Defender (This creature can't attack.)

name: Juxtapose
rulesTexts: You and target player exchange control of the creature you each control with the greatest mana value. Then exchange control of artifacts the same way. If two or more permanents a player controls are tied for greatest, their controller chooses one of them.

name: Jovial Evil
rulesTexts: Jovial Evil deals X damage to target opponent, where X is twice the number of white creatures that player controls.

name: Life Matrix
rulesTexts: {4}, {T}: Put a matrix counter on target creature and that creature gains "Remove a matrix counter from this creature: Regenerate this creature." Activate only during your upkeep.

name: Carrion Ants
rulesTexts: {1}: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Amrou Kithkin
rulesTexts: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 3 or greater.

name: Pit Scorpion
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature deals damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Xira Arien
rulesTexts:
Flying
{B}{R}{G}, {T}: Target player draws a card.

name: Great Wall
rulesTexts: Creatures with plainswalk can be blocked as though they didn't have plainswalk.

name: Storm World
rulesTexts: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, this enchantment deals X damage to that player, where X is 4 minus the number of cards in their hand.

name: Triassic Egg
rulesTexts:
{3}, {T}: Put a hatchling counter on this artifact.
Sacrifice this artifact: Choose one. Activate only if there are two or more hatchling counters on this artifact.
• You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: Undertow
rulesTexts: Creatures with islandwalk can be blocked as though they didn't have islandwalk.

name: Ichneumon Druid
rulesTexts: Whenever an opponent casts an instant spell other than the first instant spell that player casts each turn, this creature deals 4 damage to that player.

name: Gaseous Form
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Urborg
rulesTexts:
{T}: Add {B}.
{T}: Target creature loses first strike or swampwalk until end of turn.

name: Black Mana Battery
rulesTexts:
{2}, {T}: Put a charge counter on this artifact.
{T}, Remove any number of charge counters from this artifact: Add {B}, then add an additional {B} for each charge counter removed this way.

name: Riven Turnbull
rulesTexts: {T}: Add {B}.

name: Floral Spuzzem
rulesTexts: Whenever this creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may destroy target artifact defending player controls. If you do, this creature assigns no combat damage this turn.

name: Cat Warriors
rulesTexts: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Fire Sprites
rulesTexts:
Flying
{G}, {T}: Add {R}.

name: Demonic Torment
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.

name: Tolaria
rulesTexts:
{T}: Add {U}.
{T}: Target creature loses banding and all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn. Activate only during any upkeep step.

name: Land Tax
rulesTexts: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Telekinesis
rulesTexts: Tap target creature. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by that creature this turn. It doesn't untap during its controller's next two untap steps.

name: Lady Caleria
rulesTexts: {T}: Lady Caleria deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Spinal Villain
rulesTexts: {T}: Destroy target blue creature.

name: Walking Dead
rulesTexts: {B}: Regenerate this creature.

name: Takklemaggot
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, put a -0/-1 counter on that creature.
When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller chooses a creature that this card could enchant. If the player does, return this card to the battlefield under your control attached to that creature. If they don't, return this card to the battlefield under your control as a non-Aura enchantment. It loses "enchant creature" and gains "At the beginning of that player's upkeep, this enchantment deals 1 damage to that player."

name: Righteous Avengers
rulesTexts: Plainswalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Plains.)

name: North Star
rulesTexts: {4}, {T}: For one spell this turn, you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to pay that spell's mana cost. (Additional costs are still paid normally.)

name: Clergy of the Holy Nimbus
rulesTexts:
If this creature would be destroyed, regenerate it.
{1}: This creature can't be regenerated this turn. Only your opponents may activate this ability.

name: Infinite Authority
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with toughness 3 or less, destroy the other creature at end of combat. At the beginning of the next end step, if that creature was destroyed this way, put a +1/+1 counter on the first creature.

name: Fortified Area
rulesTexts: Wall creatures you control get +1/+0 and have banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Planar Gate
rulesTexts: Creature spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

name: Seeker
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or white creatures.

name: Disharmony
rulesTexts:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
Untap target attacking creature and remove it from combat. Gain control of that creature until end of turn.

name: Rapid Fire
rulesTexts:
Cast this spell only before blockers are declared.
Target creature gains first strike until end of turn. If it doesn't have rampage, that creature gains rampage 2 until end of turn. (Whenever the creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)

name: Nebuchadnezzar
rulesTexts: {X}, {T}: Choose a card name. Target opponent reveals X cards at random from their hand. Then that player discards all cards with that name revealed this way. Activate only during your turn.

name: Segovian Leviathan
rulesTexts: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

name: Ramirez DePietro
rulesTexts: First strike

name: Cathedral of Serra
rulesTexts: White legendary creatures you control have "bands with other legendary creatures." (Any legendary creatures can attack in a band as long as at least one has "bands with other legendary creatures." Bands are blocked as a group. If at least two legendary creatures you control, one of which has "bands with other legendary creatures," are blocking or being blocked by the same creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)

name: Mana Drain
rulesTexts: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.

name: Silhouette
rulesTexts: Choose target creature. If a spell or ability that targets that creature would cause a source to deal damage to that creature this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Rohgahh of Kher Keep
rulesTexts:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay {R}{R}{R}. If you don't, tap Rohgahh and all creatures named Kobolds of Kher Keep, then an opponent gains control of them.
Creatures you control named Kobolds of Kher Keep get +2/+2.

name: Wall of Shadows
rulesTexts:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to this creature by creatures it's blocking.
This creature can't be the target of spells that can target only Walls or of abilities that can target only Walls.

name: Tempest Efreet
rulesTexts:
Remove this card from your deck before playing if you're not playing for ante.
{T}, Sacrifice this creature: Target opponent may pay 10 life. If that player doesn't, they reveal a card at random from their hand. Exchange ownership of the revealed card and Tempest Efreet. Put the revealed card into your hand and Tempest Efreet from anywhere into that player's graveyard. This change in ownership is permanent.

name: Whirling Dervish
rulesTexts:
Protection from black
At the beginning of each end step, if this creature dealt damage to an opponent this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Psionic Entity
rulesTexts: {T}: This creature deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to itself.

name: Indestructible Aura
rulesTexts: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.

name: Touch of Darkness
rulesTexts: One or more target creatures become black until end of turn.

name: Wood Elemental
rulesTexts:
As this creature enters, sacrifice any number of untapped Forests.
Wood Elemental's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests sacrificed as it entered.

name: Glyph of Delusion
rulesTexts: Put X glyph counters on target creature that target Wall blocked this turn, where X is the power of that blocked creature. The creature gains "This creature doesn't untap during your untap step if it has a glyph counter on it" and "At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a glyph counter from this creature."

name: Jacques le Vert
rulesTexts: Green creatures you control get +0/+2.

name: Elder Land Wurm
rulesTexts:
Defender, trample
When this creature blocks, it loses defender.

name: Ramses Overdark
rulesTexts: {T}: Destroy target enchanted creature.

name: Rubinia Soulsinger
rulesTexts:
You may choose not to untap Rubinia Soulsinger during your untap step.
{T}: Gain control of target creature for as long as you control Rubinia Soulsinger and Rubinia Soulsinger remains tapped.

name: Bartel Runeaxe
rulesTexts:
Vigilance
Bartel Runeaxe can't be the target of Aura spells.

name: Falling Star
rulesTexts: Flip Falling Star onto the playing area from a height of at least one foot. Falling Star deals 3 damage to each creature it lands on. Tap all creatures dealt damage by Falling Star. If Falling Star doesn't turn completely over at least once during the flip, it has no effect.

name: Syphon Soul
rulesTexts: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.

name: Sylvan Paradise
rulesTexts: One or more target creatures become green until end of turn.

name: Lady Evangela
rulesTexts: {W}{B}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target creature this turn.

name: Alchor's Tomb
rulesTexts: {2}, {T}: Target permanent you control becomes the color of your choice. (This effect lasts indefinitely.)

name: Sylvan Library
rulesTexts: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

name: Wall of Light
rulesTexts:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Protection from black

name: Holy Day
rulesTexts: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Osai Vultures
rulesTexts:
Flying
At the beginning of each end step, if a creature died this turn, put a carrion counter on this creature.
Remove two carrion counters from this creature: This creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Beasts of Bogardan
rulesTexts:
Protection from red
This creature gets +1/+1 as long as an opponent controls a nontoken white permanent.

name: The Brute
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0.
{R}{R}{R}: Regenerate enchanted creature.

name: Land's Edge
rulesTexts: Discard a card: If the discarded card was a land card, this enchantment deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker. Any player may activate this ability.

name: Azure Drake
rulesTexts: Flying

name: Winter Blast
rulesTexts: Tap X target creatures. Winter Blast deals 2 damage to each of those creatures with flying.

name: Blood Lust
rulesTexts: If target creature has toughness 5 or greater, it gets +4/-4 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +4/-X until end of turn, where X is its toughness minus 1.

name: Dakkon Blackblade
rulesTexts: Dakkon Blackblade's power and toughness are each equal to the number of lands you control.

name: Shelkin Brownie
rulesTexts: {T}: Target creature loses all "bands with other" abilities until end of turn.

name: Anti-Magic Aura
rulesTexts:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells and can't be enchanted by other Auras.
